turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place an order at Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing! what did youu want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to get a medium pizza meat lovers with no sausage and and thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said one medium meat lovers pizza, no sausage and thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right for the first one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I also want to get a medium with only pepperoni and mushrooms also with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. so the order is 1 medium pizza meat lovers, no sausage and thick crust, and 1 medium pizza with pepperoni and mushrooms and thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. One more pizza, also a medium, and I'd like to get a chicken barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the chicken barbecue is also a thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all for today.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said 1 medium pizza meat lovers, no sausage and thick crust, and 1 medium pizza with pepperoni and mushrooms and thick crust, 1 medium chicken bbq pizza with thick crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right. Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $49.99. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed your order. the pizza will be ready for pick up in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
